content.html: Louisiana GOP just classified abortion as homicide & criminalized miscarriages & IVFs This is absolutely sick. The religious right in America is deeply demented We should not shy away from exposing how deranged they are Do not mince words: Their version of religion is Hate
content.value:
Louisiana GOP just classified abortion as homicide & criminalized miscarriages & IVFs

This is absolutely sick. The religious right in America is deeply demented

We should not shy away from exposing how deranged they are

Do not mince words:

Their version of religion is Hate
